title.rendered: Samsung Galaxy J3 SM-J320F (2016) 8GB 4G – smartphones (Single SIM, Android, MicroSIM, GSM, UMTS, WCDMA, LTE),Black

content.rendered:
*12 Month Warranty*Unlocked* Samsung Galaxy J3 J320F 2016 8GB Black Unlocked Grade A Excellent – These handsets have been professionally refurbished by our absolutely certified group and are in glorious working order. They can be in a wonderful beauty situation exhibiting as much as minimal indicators of damage which incorporates, however not restricted to, small/high-quality scratches and marks. They have been absolutely inspected, surgically cleaned and rigorously examined via our high quality management program to make sure that they’re in glorious working situation and in your full peace of thoughts are backed up by our complete 12 month guarantee. If you’re on the lookout for an ideal high quality telephone for your self, or to offer as a present, then that is good for you! Comes with a free USB lead solely, no further equipment are included.

Make positive this matches by coming into your mannequin quantity.
8MP, 3264×2448 pixels, Auto Focus, LED flash, Geo tagging, Face and Smile Detection, Touch Focus, Video 1080P @ 30fps, Front Camera 5MP
GPS with A-GPS + GLONASS – EDGE – 3G HSDPA 42Mbps / HSUPA 5.76Mbps – 4G LTE Cat 4.
– Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n; Wi-Fi Direct – Bluetooth v4.1 A2DP – microUSB 2.0 OTG – Video – Player MP4 / WMV / H.264 / H.263 – Audio – Player MP3 / WAV / eAAC + / AC3 / FLAC
– Stereo – FM – Radio; FM – Recording – Organiser – Editor Image / Video – Document Editor – Protocol / Commands / Voice Selector Hands-Free Built-In – – Predictive Text Input
– 8 GB inside reminiscence, 1.5 GB RAM – processor with 1.2 GHz quad-core
